text:
Frederick Charles Jones (12 September 1927 – 9 July 2019) was an English character actor. He played Sandy Thomas in "Emmerdale". He appeared in David Lynch's movies "The Elephant Man" (1980), "Dune" (1984), "Wild at Heart" (1990) as well as the short-lived TV series "On the Air" (1992) and the short movie "Hotel Room" (1993).
Jones died on 9 July 2019 at the age of 91 after a short illness.
